title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Blended Learning-Based Job-Specific Language Proficiency Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic foreign language conversations (greetings, inquiries, explanations) in work-related situations with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can recreate and propose solutions to work-related problem scenarios via role-playing in VR simulations at least three times.
Learners can complete project-based learning activities with peer learners using online collaboration tools at least twice.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
